text:
Hello - can someone please help me with the proper code to change the height of the form column so that it doesn’t run the full height of the other column?

I was trying to use this with no results
<style>

.dnd-section > .row-fluid .hbspt-form
  {
    height: 300px; /* Set your desired fixed height */
    overflow: auto; /* Add overflow property to enable scrolling if the content exceeds the fixed height */
}
</style>
Thanks <@U01A3RQBDBN> - that unfortunately didn’t help, no change.
can you provide me the page link?
<https://learn.percona.com/percona.connect.template?hs_preview=YarwSdJm-164390215314> - I unfortunately don’t have access to publish
You should have built this in the custom module.

Hi team,
I have created custom Quotes templates and added the payment gateway API for payment using JS and it's working fine once the payment is done I added the payment Status using JS DOM. but when I download the quotes templates it returns the initial quotes and does not take the updated one which is updated by JS code. Can you provide solutions for that if there is any turnaround or we can update the download quotes templates?
